item.title: 在非GNOME环境中使用TweetDeck
item.author: 作者
item.description: 在非GNOME桌面环境中，运行TweetDeck会报如下错误： Ooops, TweetDeck can't find your data TweetDeck is having trouble using some of your passwords that are stored securely on your machine. Clicking submit will clear this data so that you continue to use TweetDeck. 原因是A

item.title: 搭建自己的Twitter API
